Commentary.ab: Y8.2b vāxš] Kellens, 2006, pp. 10-11: vāxš traditionally considered a genitive, but likely a nominative attending the enumeration; however, cf. Y7.30 aršuxδəm vācim coordinated.
Y8.2d aṣ̌aōnaēca] Ir. cod. Unexpected form for aṣ̌aōnasca. Many Indian cod. secondary gen. aṣ̌aōnaheca.
Y8.2d paitī.jamiiāt̰] Geldner, Kellens, Redard paiti.jamiiāt̰.

Parallels.ab: aṣ̌aiia daδąmi xᵛarəϑəm miiazdəm hauruuata amərətāta gāuš hudā̊ = Y7.2, Y7.22, Y7.24; ~ Y3.1, Y3.21, Y3.23 xᵛarəϑəm miiazdəm āiiese yešti hauruuata amərətāta gāuš hudā̊.
hauruuata amərətāta gāuš hudā̊ haōməmca para.haōməmca aēsmąsca baōiδīmca ~ Y4.1, Y4.3 hauruuata amərətāta gąmca huδā̊ŋhəm haōməmca para.haōməmca aēsmąsca baōiδīmca.
haōməmca para.haōməmca = Y3.2, Y3.22, Y3.23, Y6.19, Y7.3, Y7.23, Y7.24, Y7.30.
aēsmąsca baōiδīmca = Y4.1, Y4.3, Y6.19, Y7.30, Y22.4; ~ Y3.2, Y3.22, Y3.23 aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi; ~ Y7.3, Y7.23, Y7.24 aēsma baōiδi; ~ Y62.2 dāitiiō.aēsmi buiiā̊ dāitiiō.baōiδi buiiā̊.

Nerangs.ab: aṣ̌aiia daδąmi xᵛarəϑəm miiazdəm hauruuata amərətāta gāuš hudā̊ haōməmca para.haōməmca aēsmąsca ēsm ud bōy nihādag ō ī ātaxš barišn frasasti ahurahe mazdā̊ ...

"At aṣ̌aiia daδąmi xᵛarəϑəm miiazdəm hauruuata amərətāta gāuš hudā̊ haōməmca para.haōməmca, between aēsmąsca. and baōiδīmca frasasti ahurahe mazdā̊... he has to bring to the fire (one piece of) the deposited ēsm and bōy."
aēsmąsca ēsm ud bōy ēk tāg nihādag ō ī ātaxš barišn baōiδīmca frasasti ahurahe mazdā̊...
"Between aēsmąsca and baōiδīmca frasasti ahurahe mazdā̊... he has to bring to the fire one of the deposited pieces of ēsm and bōy.

ab.ab: "The rāspī picks up the third set of sandalwood and frankincense and offers it to the fire, while saying the last words of st. I (Y8.2): "May He [Ahura Mazda] come to us through righteousness" (ashaya nō paiti-jamyāt).
